text:
Red Oak Strategic is an
advanced tier AWS partner.

It was an honor for us to be
part of leading the program,

actually doing the
engineering that it takes

to run a successful Iowa
caucus here in January.

The challenge that we
faced was running

these caucus programs, are
actually really challenging
because they're a caucus,

they don't receive the
same federal funding
and support from the state governments.

That a normal election when
you go to a voting booth

and kind of cast your ballot,
would. We used AWS services,

including AWS Countdown
Premium, to make sure

that the architecture that we
built from scratch using AWS
services was secure, performant

and was giving them
everything they need to go

and kind of conduct their
caucus safely, securely.

What Premium offered for
us was this extra layer
of expertise that we didn't really have an
ability to duplicate.

More and more companies
are really going to need

this specialized support that
AWS Countdown Premium offers.

Without that, you're always
going to be risking
the support or the launch of your events.

We couldn't be more proud
of how this ended up.

Not only was this caucus
safe, secure and,
kind of a public success
for sharing these results with the world.
We were able to complete the caucus

and share all of the votes
that same night.
Truly, you have millions
and millions of eyes on you that night

and we wanted
to honor the client.

We also wanted to honor
the democratic process

and make sure that everyone
could trust in the results
that they were seeing and that they could
get them in a timely manner

when people were
really watching. Our partnership
and our skills, mostly using AWS services,

was going to help us make sure
that this ran the way

that they needed, and we were
really happy that we were able
to do that.
